mainContent.title: A unique setting, personalized support
mainContent.description1: At REMES, we have chosen a unique model: a medicalized hotel residence located on the Mediterranean coast, which combines care, support and quality of life.
mainContent.description2: We welcome elderly people, those with loss of autonomy or in a situation of disability, as well as anyone who needs adapted support. Here, everyone benefits from personalized follow-up, respectful of their pace, their desires and their history.
mainContent.description3: More than a place of care, REMES is above all a place of life: a bright, green and secure setting, where each resident is recognized as a unique person, surrounded by attention and kindness.

quote.text: As director of REMES, my deep conviction is that every person deserves to be accompanied with respect and dignity, in an environment that preserves their identity and their lifestyle habits. Thanks to the continuous presence of a dynamic, competent and committed team, we offer each person welcomed the security of personalized support. We adapt to the needs, pace and habits of each person, whether it's a long-term stay, a short stay or adapted holidays, always with warmth and kindness. Our ambition: to make REMES more than a place of care, a real place of life, where you feel recognized, surrounded and at home.

meta.title: Care Expertise | Medical Team & Professional Care | REMES Tunisia
meta.description: Discover REMES care expertise in Tunisia. 24/7 medical presence, multidisciplinary team, and personalized care plans. Professional medical care for seniors with European standards.

presence.title: Continuous and reassuring presence
presence.paragraph1: At REMES, the safety and comfort of our residents is based on 24/7 nursing presence. Each care plan is developed in consultation with the resident, their family and management, to offer truly personalized care.
presence.paragraph2: Our privileged supervision ratio guarantees close follow-up and constant attention, well beyond European standards. Here, each resident benefits from attentive support that promotes a dignified and serene daily life.

paramedical.paragraph: Our paramedical team consists of a physiotherapist and an occupational therapist present every day at the residence. They ensure rehabilitation, maintenance of motor skills and adaptation to daily gestures. A speech therapist also intervenes regularly, to stimulate communication skills and promote the maintenance of cognitive autonomy.

multidisciplinary.title: A multidisciplinary team by your side
multidisciplinary.paragraph: Our medical and paramedical team brings together a range of varied and complementary skills: coordinating physician, nurses, nursing assistants, physiotherapists, psychologist, speech therapist, and occupational therapist. Alongside them, independent professionals (general practitioners, specialist doctors, podiatrist, etc.) intervene regularly according to each residentâ€™s specific needs. Our physician relies on a network of specialists who are quickly available for our residents. Thanks to our partnerships with accredited clinics, including the international CARTHAGE MÃ‰DICAL center and the ESSALEM clinic in Sousse, access to tests and hospital care is made easier. And because no resident should face these moments alone, we always provide transportation and attentive support from our nursing assistants, who stay by their side for as long as needed. This multidisciplinary approach allows for comprehensive careâ€”medical, functional, and psychologicalâ€”to address all the needs associated with aging and related conditions.

safety.title: Safety and quality of care
safety.paragraph: REMES pays special attention to securing the medication process: supervised prescriptions, secure storage accessible only to authorized staff, and strict compliance with the cold chain for sensitive treatments. Our teams receive continuous training throughout their careers. This approach ensures the application of best geriatric practices, even in exceptional health situations, and allows care to be adapted to advances in medicine and the evolving needs of residents.

meta.title: Hosting Solutions | Permanent & Temporary Care | REMES Tunisia
meta.description: Discover REMES hosting solutions in Tunisia. Permanent accommodation, temporary stays, day care, and convalescence services. Flexible and personalized care solutions for seniors.

permanent.title: Permanent Accommodation
permanent.paragraph1: With age, certain daily gestures become difficult and can weigh on both the elderly person and their loved ones.
permanent.paragraph2: Living at REMES means choosing a medicalized residence that combines security, comfort and serenity in a setting adapted to each situation.
permanent.paragraph3: Our modern and spacious rooms are designed to guarantee total accessibility, regardless of the degree of autonomy. Each resident benefits from a personalized care plan, defined in consultation with them and their family, and followed by a multidisciplinary team available 24/7 and 7/7 (doctors, nurses, nursing assistants, physiotherapists).

priority.text: Our priority is simple: that each resident finds at REMES a new 'home', where they feel surrounded by benevolence and attention

temporary.title: Temporary Accommodation
temporary.paragraph: Short stay or temporary accommodation is a flexible solution that responds to different situations:

benefits.benefit1: Break isolation and regain social life.
benefits.benefit3: Discover the residence before a permanent stay.
benefits.benefit4: Or allow families and caregivers to breathe during a trip or vacation.

temporary.details: At REMES, residents welcomed for temporary stays benefit from the same services, care and attention as those in permanent stays: comfortable accommodation, quality catering, personalized support. The maximum duration is three months. Admission is simple, with an administrative and medical file, completed by a pre-admission visit and the signing of a clear and transparent stay contract.

daycare.title: Day Care
daycare.paragraph: Day care at REMES is aimed at seniors with Alzheimer's disease, related disorders or loss of autonomy, who wish to benefit from adapted and stimulating support while remaining at home the rest of the time. It offers several advantages:

benefits.benefit2: Maintain cognitive and motor abilities through varied activities
benefits.benefit3: Provide respite time for family caregivers, reassured to know their parent surrounded and safe.

daycare.conclusion: Day care thus represents a precious balance between home maintenance and specialized support.

convalescence.title: Convalescence Stay
convalescence.paragraph: After hospitalization, surgery or illness, returning home can seem fragile and a source of worry. The convalescence stay at REMES allows this transition to be approached with serenity. Our convalescent residents benefit from:

benefits.benefit2: Balanced meals taking into account each person's nutritional needs.
benefits.benefit3: Rigorous medicalized follow-up and personalized physiotherapy sessions.
benefits.benefit4: Complete hotel care and practical services to limit fatigue.

convalescence.conclusion: This secure and soothing setting promotes good recovery. After a few weeks at REMES, everyone can return home with more confidence, strength and serenity.

permanent.title: Permanent Stay

temporary.title: Temporary Stay

services.service1: Airport transfer â€“ REMES â€“ Airport
services.service2: Accommodation in modern, spacious, ground-floor room, with private terrace, equipped with a medical bed if necessary.
services.service3: Daily care provided by our multidisciplinary team.
services.service4: Individualized support through an assigned nursing assistant, available for each resident during all waking hours (from 7h to 20h), 7 days a week.

meta.title: The Residence | Location & Facilities | REMES Tunisia
meta.description: Discover REMES residence in Tunisia. Located in Monastir-Skanes, 200m from the beach, integrated into a 4-star hotel with modern rooms and Mediterranean facilities.

location.title: Location
location.paragraph1: Located in Monastir, in the heart of the Skanes tourist area, our medicalized residence benefits from a privileged location, only 200 meters from a fine sand beach. Nestled between Monastir and Sousse, it benefits from both the vitality of two major cities and the calm of a seaside resort.
location.paragraph2: Both cities have first-class hospital and medical infrastructure, providing additional security for our residents and their families. Integrated into a 4-star hotel, the residence opens onto green relaxation spaces, with two pools (indoor and outdoor) that extend the Mediterranean sweetness.

rooms.title: Rooms to your image
rooms.paragraph1: Spacious, bright and entirely on one level, REMES rooms combine hotel comfort and medical safety. With their 30 mÂ² and their private terrace, they become real living spaces, where you can enjoy the Mediterranean sun and views of the gardens or pool.
rooms.paragraph2: Soberly elegant and customizable, they adapt to everyone: alone or as a couple, residents quickly find their bearings by bringing their decoration and personal memories.
rooms.equipment: Included equipment: medical bed, adapted bathroom, desk with telephone line, television with international channels, air conditioning, wifi, individual safe, small refrigerator and patient call system connected to the team 24/7.

spaces.title: Living and conviviality spaces
spaces.description: At REMES, quality of life also comes from the richness of the spaces made available.

features.feature1: Tree-lined gardens, populated with majestic palm trees, inviting to walk and rest.
features.feature2: Private beach, calm and preserved, to breathe the sea air and contemplate the Mediterranean.
features.feature3: Warm and bright lounges, to meet between residents or with family.
features.feature4: Spacious restaurants, where to enjoy balanced meals in a friendly atmosphere.
features.feature5: Indoor and outdoor pools, true havens of well-being and serenity.

spaces.conclusion: These varied spaces allow everyone to find their balance between relaxation, conviviality and social connection, in an environment where nature, light and comfort combine harmoniously.

hero.title: Entertainment & Activities
hero.description: Nursing Home / Living at REMES / Entertainment & Activities

content.introduction: Life at REMES is animated by a rich and evolving program, designed to stimulate abilities, encourage creativity and maintain social connection. Our residents participate in:

activities.activity1: Memory workshops and cognitive games to maintain the mind.
activities.activity2: Gentle gymnastics and adapted movements to preserve mobility.
activities.activity3: Creative activities (visual arts, light crafts) to express freely.
activities.activity4: Shared culinary workshops, combining conviviality and gourmet pleasure.
activities.activity5: Cultural and musical moments: readings, film screenings, mini-concerts.

content.externalIntervenants: External intervenants (artists, musicians, chef, zootherapist) regularly come to enrich the programming.
content.outings: To maintain a living link with the outside, we also organize adapted outings: market walks, cultural visits (museums, cinema), sea or zoo walks. A minibus adapted to people with reduced mobility is made available to ensure comfort and safety during these trips.
content.conclusion: Each activity is designed in connection with our multidisciplinary team, to be both fun, stimulating and secure.

hero.title: Meals & Daily Services
hero.description: Nursing Home / Living at REMES / Meals & Daily Services

content.nutritionPhilosophy: At REMES, eating well to age well is obvious. Our menus, developed with a dietician, combine nutritional balance and gustatory pleasure. Every day, our chef and his team prepare delicious dishes on site using fresh products, inspired by Mediterranean and continental cuisines.
content.diningOptions: Meals can be taken in our bright and friendly restaurant, served in the room if necessary, or in the tree-lined garden on fine days. These outdoor meals, much appreciated, offer real moments of freedom and sharing.
content.familyWelcome: Families are welcome: an open table allows them to share a meal with their resident parent in a friendly atmosphere.
content.specialNeeds: Special attention is paid to residents with specific needs: adapted textures, feeding assistance, hydration monitoring. Finally, for everyone's comfort:

dailyServices.roomCleaning: Daily (or even twice-daily) maintenance of rooms and private spaces.
dailyServices.laundry: Laundry service including provided household linen and personal clothing, carefully maintained and returned.

meta.title: About REMES - Medical Residence in Tunisia | Excellence in Care
meta.description: Discover REMES, Tunisia's premier medical residence since 2009. Located in Skanes by the Mediterranean, we offer exceptional care, comfort, and serenity in a 4-star hotel setting. Learn about our mission, philosophy, and expert team.

hero.title: About Us
hero.description: Welcome to REMES Where excellence in care meets Mediterranean lifestyle

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At REMES, we reinvent medicalized care by offering each person welcomed a safe, human and warm environment, where the quality of care naturally combines with the quality of life. Our absolute priority is to preserve the dignity, comfort and serenity of each person, respecting their personal history.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.description: We firmly believe that a medicalized establishment should not only be a place of care, but above all a real place of life. This is why we favor a human-scale approach, where each resident is known by their first name, recognized in their uniqueness and accompanied according to their unique journey and their own needs.

exceptionalSetting.title: An Exceptional Setting
exceptionalSetting.description: Nestled in the heart of a 4-star hotel in the tourist area of Skanes, just 200 meters from the Mediterranean, our residence benefits from a truly exceptional environment. Between landscaped gardens and sunny terraces, this bright and green setting is naturally conducive to well-being and serenity.

expertTeam.title: A Team of Dedicated Experts
expertTeam.description: Our strength lies in an exceptional multidisciplinary team: doctors, specialized nurses, physiotherapists, psychologists and social life staff. Attentive, committed and available 24/7, this team offers personalized support that responds both to specific medical needs and daily expectations, in a constant spirit of human warmth and benevolence.

customOffer.title: A Tailored Offer
customOffer.description: Whether it's a permanent stay, a short respite or convalescence stay, or even adapted therapeutic vacations, REMES offers flexible and personalized solutions, designed to adapt to each life path. We also support families in this important step, involving them in their loved one's care project. Discover our unique universe where excellence in care and gentleness of living combine daily. Contact us for a personalized visit and meet our dedicated team.

whatIsRemes.title: What is REMES?
whatIsRemes.description1: Resort Medical is the first medicalized hotel retirement home in Tunisia, welcoming French speakers since 2009. Located in Skanes, just steps from the Mediterranean, it offers a wooded, bright and secure setting.
whatIsRemes.description2: A peaceful and high-end place of life, combining comfort, personalized care and pleasant climate. The objective: preserve autonomy and offer a serene retirement in an exceptional environment.

meta.description: Partner with REMES for accessible tourism in Tunisia. B2B services for travel agencies, tour operators, and organizations. Complete adapted stay solutions, medical care, and accessible accommodation for your clients. Contact us for professional partnerships.

meta.title: Accessible Accommodation Tunisia | Adapted Rooms & Facilities | REMES
meta.description: Discover accessible accommodation at REMES Tunisia. Spacious, wheelchair-accessible rooms with garden/pool views, free WiFi, international TV, and emergency call systems. Fully ground-level facility designed for comfort and independence.

content.title: What is Adapted Accommodation?
content.paragraph1: At REMES residence, our rooms combine comfort, accessibility and serenity so that everyone can fully enjoy their stay. Spacious, bright and functional, they are designed to meet everyone's needs, without compromising on well-being.

features.title: The advantages of our rooms
features.item2: Generous surface area to facilitate movement.
features.item3: Accessible terraces, with garden or pool view.
features.item4: Bright and modern rooms, conducive to rest.
features.item5: Free high-speed Wi-Fi throughout the establishment.
features.item6: Televisions with international channels (French, English, Italian).
features.item7: Integrated patient call systems for more security.

content.conclusion: At REMES, we combine the requirement of accessibility with the warmth of a vacation stay, to offer everyone a setting where well-being and autonomy meet.

meta.title: Adapted Transport Tunisia | Accessible Vehicles & Tours | REMES
meta.description: Discover adapted transport services at REMES Tunisia. Wheelchair-accessible vehicles, airport transfers, city tours, and excursions to Sousse, Monastir, Carthage. Professional drivers trained in disability assistance. Safe and comfortable travel in Tunisia.

content.title: Tunisia, accessible to all
content.paragraph1: transfers, outings, excursionsâ€¦ our adapted vehicles take you everywhere safely.
content.paragraph2: With REMES, enjoy one of the very first transport services specially adapted for people with reduced mobility in Tunisia.
content.paragraph3: Our vehicles, fitted according to international standards, guarantee comfort, safety and dignity, whether you are in a manual or electric wheelchair.

journeys.title: Customized trips
journeys.item1: Airport transfers: on arrival as well as departure
journeys.item2: Relaxation outings: in town, by the sea or for a coffee on the terrace
journeys.item3: Discovery excursions: Sousse, Monastir, Carthage, Sidi Bou SaÃ¯d, the Saharaâ€¦

drivers.title: Trained and attentive drivers
drivers.description: Our experienced and caring drivers are sensitized to accompanying people with disabilities. Their mission: to make every trip pleasant and worry-free.

meta.title: Personalized Medical Care Tunisia | Adapted Care Services | REMES
meta.description: Discover personalized medical care at REMES Tunisia. Professional nursing team, physiotherapy sessions, personal assistance, and continuous care coordination. Discreet, compassionate care during your vacation in Tunisia.

content.title: Personalized support
content.paragraph1: Your care, without compromise: a discreet and caring team watches over you, even on vacation.
content.paragraph2: According to your needs, you can benefit from the presence of a caregiver or home care assistant during your travels
content.paragraph3: A discreet, caring and always available nursing team
content.paragraph4: Because going on vacation should never mean giving up safety or continuity of care, REMES residence makes available to you an experienced and attentive multidisciplinary team.
content.paragraph5: Our staff consists of doctors, nurses, nursing assistants, home care assistants and physiotherapists, present on site and available according to your needs, respecting your pace and privacy.

services.title: A reassuring presence, without intrusion
services.item1: Help with toileting, dressing, moving if necessary
services.item2: Nursing care provided on site, on prescription
services.item3: Possibility of physiotherapy sessions during the stay
services.item4: Support for activities, meals or outings if needed
services.item5: Coordination with usual doctors to ensure continuity of care before, during and after the stay

content.conclusion: Here, everything is designed so that you can fully enjoy your vacation, with confidence, with the support of a trained, discreet and caring team.

meta.title: Medical Equipment Rental Tunisia | Adapted Medical Devices | REMES
meta.description: Rent medical equipment at REMES Tunisia. Wheelchairs, medical beds, patient lifts, and medical supplies available on-site. No need to bring heavy equipment - we provide everything for your comfort and autonomy during your stay in Tunisia.

content.title: Travel light, we take care of the rest
content.paragraph1: So that you can travel with peace of mind, REMES residence makes available to you all the medical equipment necessary for your comfort and autonomy, during your stay in Tunisia.
content.paragraph2: No need to bring wheelchair, medical bed, patient lift or specific medical accessories: We ensure the provision on site of adapted equipment, installed according to your needs, before your arrival.
content.paragraph4: You can also benefit, on request, from all the necessary medical consumables (protections, dressings, hygiene equipment, etc.) for a serene stay without logistical worries.
